solution_line_template: Ann had {oatmeal_baked} dozen oatmeal cookies - {oatmeal_given} dozen = <<{oatmeal_baked}-{oatmeal_given}={oatmeal_left}>>{oatmeal_left} dozen oatmeal cookies left.
Ann had {sugar_baked} dozen sugar cookies - {sugar_given} dozen = <<{sugar_baked}-{sugar_given}={sugar_left}>>{sugar_left} dozen sugar cookies left.
Ann had {chocolate_baked} dozen chocolate chip cookies - {chocolate_given} dozen = {chocolate_left} dozen chocolate chip cookies left.
Ann has a total of {oatmeal_left} + {sugar_left} + {chocolate_left} dozen cookies = <<{oatmeal_left}+{sugar_left}+{chocolate_left}={total_dozens_left}>>{total_dozens_left} dozen cookies.
{total_dozens_left} dozen cookies is {total_dozens_left} *{dozen} cookies = <<{total_dozens_left}*{dozen}={answer}>>{answer} cookies remaining.
